Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
Sure, I can help with that! Could you please let me know which platform or service you're using for the pixel integration? This will help me provide you with the most accurate guidance.

Great! For integrating the NewsBreak Pixel with Google Tag Manager (GTM), you can follow these steps:

1. Log into your NewsBreak account and navigate to Tools > Ad Manager > Event Management.
2. Choose Pixel as your tracking type and select GTM as the integration method.
3. Specify your event type and turn on Event value if applicable.
4. Copy the generated base code from Step 1.
5. In GTM, create a new tag and paste the copied base code into it.
6. Set up triggers for the events you want to track.
7. Save and publish your changes in GTM.

For more detailed instructions, please refer to this article: [How to install a NewsBreak Pixel with GTM](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18551604763405-How-to-install-a-NewsBreak-Pixel-on-Shopify). Let me know if you need further assistance!
Thank you for your feedback. You can click the close icon below to close this widget.
Thanks for contacting us and we want to hear from you!
